page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: The{farms}are very important in this area.The farmers mostly grow cereal crops, grassland and rough grazing,they farm a lot of land.The hills are big and overlook some very beautifull views.There are many long and quiet walks along the{Quantock {Hills.}Near to Doniford camp is a railway. It runs steam trains and is a great tourist attraction.There is a lot of tourism in our block as it is near the sea.There are alot of camps for hoilday makers.But there are some hazzards as well like narrow and twisting roads.The"walls"which lead up to{East Quantoxhead}are so narrow that cars and lorries have to drive in the middle of the road.There is a small village of{West Quantoxhead}in the shape of a triangle. There are one or two disused quarries which are quite overgrown.
